name: Land of Blood
description:
This game has two modes:

  • Adventure: Here your goal is to complete maps to earn stars. Unlock perks by spending stars in the Perk shop.
  • Survival: Survive as long as you can through endless waves of monsters. Perks can only be leveled up in survival mode.
Controls

WSAD/Arrow keys: Movement
R : Reload
Left Mouse : Fire
Mouse : Aim
ESC/P : Game menu
